DIF.Entry_Title: Synthesis of Thwaites Glacier Dynamics: Diagnostic and Prognostic Sensitivity Studies of a West Antarctic Outlet System

Data_Set_Citation.Dataset_Title: Synthesis of Thwaites Glacier Dynamics: Diagnostic and Prognostic Sensitivity Studies of a West Antarctic Outlet System
Data_Set_Citation.Dataset_Publisher: NSIDC: National Snow and Ice Data Center

Reference.Author: Parizek, B. R.
Reference.Title: Dynamic (in)stability of Thwaites Glacier, West Antarctica

Parameters.Variable_Level_1: Glacier Mass Balance/Ice Sheet Mass Balance

Contact_Address.Address: National Snow and Ice Data Center

Summary.Abstract: This data set consists of experimental output from a higher-order finite-element model that was utilized in conjunction with existing data sets to isolate essential physical processes affecting Thwaites Glacier (TG) in the Amundsen Sea Embayment (ASE) of West Antarctica.

West Antarctic Links to Sea-level Estimation (WALSE) Workshop
